name: John Doe
bio: Experienced software engineer with a passion for open-source.
longDescription: John has over 10 years of experience in the software industry, working with various technologies and mentoring junior developers. He is a strong advocate for open-source and has contributed to several popular projects.

name: Jane Smith
bio: Data scientist and machine learning enthusiast.
longDescription: Jane is a data scientist with a background in academic research. She has a deep understanding of machine learning algorithms and has applied them to solve real-world problems in various domains.

name: Peter Jones
bio: UX/UI designer with a focus on user-centered design.
longDescription: Peter is a creative and detail-oriented designer who is passionate about creating intuitive and engaging user experiences. He has a strong understanding of design principles and has worked on a wide range of projects, from mobile apps to large-scale web applications.
